name: Create team

params.name: maintainers
params.description: The logins of organization members to add as maintainers of the team.

params.name: repo_names
params.description: The full name (e.g., "organization-name/repository-name") of repositories to add the team to.

params.name: privacy
params.description:
The level of privacy this team should have. The options are:  
**For a non-nested team:**  
\* `secret` \- only visible to organization owners and members of this team.  
\* `closed` \- visible to all members of this organization.  
Default: `secret`  
**For a parent or child team:**  
\* `closed` \- visible to all members of this organization.  
Default for child team: `closed`  
**Note**: You must pass the `hellcat-preview` media type to set privacy default to `closed` for child teams. **For a parent or child team:**

params.name: permission
params.description:
**Deprecated**. The permission that new repositories will be added to the team with when none is specified. Can be one of:  
\* `pull` \- team members can pull, but not push to or administer newly-added repositories.  
\* `push` \- team members can pull and push, but not administer newly-added repositories.  
\* `admin` \- team members can pull, push and administer newly-added repositories.

params.name: parent_team_id
params.description: The ID of a team to set as the parent team. **Note**: You must pass the `hellcat-preview` media type to use this parameter.

description: To create a team, the authenticated user must be a member of `:org`.
